org.daisy.common.xml

Interface DocumentBuilder


  • public interface DocumentBuilder
    Produces a document object model from a possibly non-XML file.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Document parse(InputSource input)
      Parse the input
      boolean supportsContentType(String type)
      Test whether this parser supports a given content media type.

    • Method Detail

      • supportsContentType

        boolean supportsContentType(String type)
        Test whether this parser supports a given content media type.
        Parameters:
        type - a MIME type, e.g. "text/html"

      • parse

        Document parse(InputSource input)
        throws SAXException,
               IOException
        Parse the input
        Throws:
        SAXException - if the input could not be parsed
        IOException - if the input could not be read
